name: quick-powder
effect: Held by Ditto: Doubles the holder’s initial Speed.
short_effect: Doubles Ditto’s Speed when held. The boost is lost after transforming.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.
